title: AMERICAN HORROR STORIES: Season 1 Trailer Teaser (2021)
author: Movie Trailers Source
comment: Remember! This isn't a new AHS season, it's rather a spinoff series of AHS. AHS10 - Double Feature will release on August 25th!

Single seasons will be anthology style now? 
So there's a chance of getting through an entire season without it running out of steam 3/4 of the way through now? 
I'm in!
About time! I was starting to believe this would never come out! :D
This brought joy to my heart

This is really exciting summer for me as I will be watching a load of season as they are released (AHSs, AHS & ACS). I binged AHS & ACS over the last month and have been watching loads of Sarah’s movies and shows aswell as loads of other incredible Middle Aged actresses work!
description: First trailer for American Horror Stories Season 1 on Hulu.
